DOC.brief_summary: Vitiligo common chronic skin disease 1-4 % prevalence . It significant psychosocial impact patient society . Different treatment modality variable success rate available . Phototherapy among successful treatment give modest result . Some report document usefulness Ginkgo Biloba ( GB ) use alone Vitiligo treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Ginkgo Biloba Narrow Band UVB Treatment Vitiligo
DOC.detailed_description: Adding GB phototherapy , especially commonly used one ; Narrow-Band UVB ( NBUVB ) might give good result use either one alone . This might improve repigmentation well patient ' quality-of-life . ( QOL ) . This prospective double-blind randomize controlled clinical trial . One-hundred-sixty Vitiligo patient randomly divide 2 group ( 80 patient per group ) . One group receive oral GB ( 2 tablet 60 mgs twice daily ) NBUVB twice weekly . The group receive placebo tablet ( identical size , shape color ) GB twice daily NBUVB twice weekly . Both group treat 6 month . Standard protocol phototherapy use group . Our aim see whether add GB NBUVB lead good repigmentation placebo .
